data.name: Fairtravel Battle
data.detailed_description:
Fairtravel Battle is a fantasy collectible card game experience with no microtransactions

This game is a labor of love for the collectible card game genre, and is aiming to become a fun game to play with friends casually.

Features


No Microtransactions

Fairtravel Battle will never have any microtransactions of any kind. Each card and reward can only be obtained by playing the game. No hidden fees.

Lots of Rewards

Earn gold through winning games, doing quests, or participating in multiplayer game modes.

Earn renown during each match, which you can use to unlock rewards such as specific cards and card styles.

Earn mastery during each match, which unlocks free rewards.

Multiple Game Modes

  • Battle with your collection in the Duel mode
  • Pick one card at a time to make a deck in Draft mode
  • Open temporary packs to make a deck in Sealed mode
  • Deckbuild in Explorer mode
  • Play in team battles with up to 4 players

Play Anywhere

Each game mode supports online and LAN play, as well as offline battles versus the CPU. You can also add CPUs to online team lobbies.
